name: streams
description: Get info on streams and streamers

options.name: approve
options.description: [TEAM] Approve an LDSG Streamer for notifications

options.name: unapprove
options.description: [TEAM] Remove someone from the Approved Streamer and Community Streamer roles

options.name: user
options.description: The user to remove the roles from

options.name: follow
options.description: [MGMT] Add a non-member's channel to notifications

options.name: unfollow
options.description: [MGMT] Remove a non-member's channel from notifications.

options.name: extralife-goal
options.description: Check the LDSG Extra Life Goal

options.name: extralife-live
options.description: See who is live on the LDSG Extra Life Team

options.name: multi
options.description: Links to multi-stream pages on Multistre.am

options.name: user1
options.description: A user to add to the multistre.am

options.name: info
options.description: Displays LDSG stream status and stream info

options.name: live
options.description: See who is live in LDSG

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to look up (alternative to user)
